title: The Place God Chooses
summary: Deuteronomy 12 emphasizes worshiping God only at the place He chooses. Israel is commanded to destroy pagan altars and offer sacrifices only in God's designated location, maintaining purity in worship.

faq.question: Why was worship restricted to one place?
faq.answer: To keep worship pure and centered on the true God, not influenced by pagan practices.

faq.question: What were they told to do with pagan altars?
faq.answer: Tear them down, break their idols, and destroy their sacred places.
